title: Saenai Heroine no Sodatekata - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Artists   Glasses-wearing Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Otaku   Writers
author: Maruto Fumiaki
description:
The life of Tomoya Aki, a highschool otaku working part time to support his BD hoarding. With remarkable luck, he bumps head-first into, Megumi Katou, the most beautiful girl he has ever seen. Naturally, the meeting twists his life into a complicated torrent of relationships. Eriri Spencer Sawamura, his half-foreigner childhood friend who’s always valued her relationship with Tomoyo. Kasumigaoka Utaha, a cold, composed renowned literary genius who shoves everyone aside from our protagonist. What is this? An eroge introduction?

The tale of a small not quite doujin circle, but not quite indie studio’s journey through the tough territory of comiket and beyond.>
